ygData.subject: Re: Re: Fishing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah, but another thing you can do is fish long enough to catch 3 fish (and perhaps a sandal or dagger thrown in) - sell the fish and then buy the muffins
ygData.messageBody:
Wayne Sheppard wrote:
>
>
>
> I'll do the math. I buy muffins and milk for 6cp each, usually 2 stacks of
> 20 each. That's less than 5gp, enough to last me many days.
>
> If you fish to roleplay or to relax, or just for fun, that's fine. But
> there is no economic advantage to fishing. You could buy more food from 5
> minutes of killing lvl-1 monsters than you would get from fishing for 30
> minutes.
>
> Wayne
>


Ah, but another thing you can do is fish long enough to catch 3 fish
(and perhaps a sandal or dagger thrown in) - sell the fish and then buy
the muffins and milk. Fishing adds variety to the game. I've also done
fishing when I really need to read a textbook (for work), but I really
want to paly EQ. I compromise by fishing. Read a paragraph, press the
fishing hot key, read a paragraph, press the fishing hot key....

Mostly I use fishing to pass the time waiting for a boat, and of course
I work on sense heading at the same time.


Jerrilia
Bard of the 9th song
Luclin
